title: Tool Triasm (Salival, Schism, and Parabola) NTSC full menus for
description:
Mixed first 3 Tool DVDs together using dvdremake pro
Kept all menus in tact, also no compression from the original files I grabbed, used patch method to change from PAL to NTSC, created the menu through Encore and CS2, song on menu is Hooker With A Penis (Lounge Version) from a 1998 concert

(I set all root menu's to where if you don't have a title and a root menu button on your DVD controller let it set on the root menu for approximately 1 minute and then it will link back to the title menu or just press next in root menu and it will also link you back to the title menu)

Original Files Include

Salival DVD (PAL) [2000]
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3958524/Tool_-_Salival_DVD_(PAL)_%5B2000%5D



Schism DVD (PAL) [2005]

Parabola DVD (PAL) [2005]
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3958521/Tool_-_Parabola_DVD_(PAL)_%5B2005%5D
